allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: D&D 5.5e Character Viewer

- React + Vite + TypeScript setup
- Character sheet display with tabs (Stats, Spells, Inventory, Bio)
- Editable fields with theme support
- Fixed build issues (CSS, import map, scrolling)
- Added favicon

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: per-material toggle for spell components

- Add SpellMaterial interface with name + collected boolean
- Replace materialComponents string with materials array
- Each material has checkbox toggle in edit mode
- View mode shows checkmark/circle status per material
- API fetch converts material string to array format

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: material toggles work like spell slots

- Edit mode: add/remove material names only (no checkbox)
- View mode: clickable circular toggles (always active)
- Filled = have it, empty = don''t have/used
- Matches spell slot UX pattern

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: spell materials tracking system" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add per-material toggle system for spell components
- Each spell can have multiple materials with collected/uncollected state
- Spell cards dim when materials are missing
- Components badge (V, S, M) shown on spell cards
- Sticky header for easier editing
- Mobile fixes for z-index and overflow

## Changes
- `types.ts`: Added `SpellMaterial` interface, `materials` array and `components` field to `Spell`
- `SheetDisplay.tsx`: Material toggles in edit mode, visual indicators in view mode
- `index.css`: Full height layout for sticky header support

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")
